Ending Boy Hänsel

終(しゅう)末(まつ)少(しょう)年(ねん)ヘンゼル(ヘンゼル)shuumatsu shounen HENZERU

"Pollo's Theme"

"If his body should rot away, he’ll be reborn any number of times."
L

A song about Hänsel's lives as Hänsel, Pollo, and Lemy, and his role as an irregular.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version of the song released as as a special digital bonus for purchasers of both Seven Crimes and Punishments and Deadly Sins of Evil: Fifth Pierrot. It was later featured on EVILS EXTRA.

Albums

Notes

  • The song Genesis Girl Gretel serves as a complement to Ending Boy Hänsel.
  • The song was paired up with Gensis Girl Gretel in supplementary material for EVILS EXTRA.
